alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:57AM MST until December 31 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Fourth Of July Pass, Craigmont, Winchester, Wallace, Osburn, Nezperce, Dobson Pass, Soldiers Meadow Road, Kamiah, Kellogg, St. Maries, Fernwood, Lookout Pass, Mullan, and Pinehurst. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
